verses.verse: Jude, <S%G2455><s%> Of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Bondman, <S%G1401><s%> Brother <S%G80><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Of James, <S%G2385><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> The <S%G1722><s%> In God <S%G2316><s%> The Father <S%G3962><s%>, Sanctified <S%G37><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Kept <S%G5083><s%> Called Ones. <S%G2822><s%>
Mercy <S%G1656><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace, <S%G1515><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Be Multiplied. <S%G4129><s%>

Beloved, <S%G27><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Diligence <S%G4710><s%> Using <S%G4160><s%> To Write <S%G1125><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Common <S%G2839><s%> Salvation, <S%G4991><s%> Necessity <S%G318><s%> I Had <S%G2192><s%> To Write <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Exhorting <S%G3870><s%> You To Contend Earnestly <S%G1864><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Once <S%G530><s%> Delivered <S%G3860><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Saints <S%G40><s%> Faith. <S%G4102><s%>

<S%G3921><s%> For Came In Stealthily <S%G1063><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Of Old <S%G3819><s%> Have Been Before Marked Out <S%G4270><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sentence, <S%G2917><s%> Ungodly Persons <S%G765><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2316><s%> Of Our God <S%G2257><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> Changing <S%G3346><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Licentiousness <S%G766><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Only <S%G3441><s%> Master <S%G1203><s%>, God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Denying. <S%G720><s%>

<S%G5279><s%> But Put In Remembrance <S%G1161><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> I Would, <S%G1014><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Once <S%G530><s%>, This, <S%G5124><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> A People <S%G2992><s%> Out Of The <S%G1537><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Egypt <S%G125><s%> Having Saved, <S%G4982><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In The Second Place <S%G1208><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Believed Not <S%G4100><s%> He Destroyed. <S%G622><s%>

Angels <S%G32><s%> And <S%G5037><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Kept Not <S%G5083><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Own <S%G1438><s%> First State, <S%G746><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Left <S%G620><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Own <S%G2398><s%> Dwelling, <S%G3613><s%> Unto The <S%G1519><s%> Judgment Of <S%G2920><s%> The Great <S%G3173><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> In Bonds <S%G1199><s%> Eternal <S%G126><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> Darkness <S%G2217><s%> He Keeps; <S%G5083><s%>

As <S%G5613><s%> Sodom <S%G4670><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Gomorrah, <S%G1116><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Around <S%G4012><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Cities, <S%G4172><s%> In <S%G3588><s%> Like <S%G3664><s%> With Them <S%G5125><s%> Manner <S%G5158><s%> Having Given Themselves To Fornication <S%G1608><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gone <S%G565><s%> After <S%G3694><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Other, <S%G2087><s%> Are Set Forth As <S%G4295><s%> An Example, <S%G1164><s%> Of Fire <S%G4442><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> The Penalty <S%G1349><s%> Undergoing. <S%G5254><s%>

<S%G3668><s%> Yet In Like Manner <S%G3305><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> Dreamers <S%G1797><s%> <S%G4561><s%> The Flesh <S%G3303><s%> Defile, <S%G3392><s%> Lordship <S%G2963><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Set Aside, <S%G114><s%> Glories <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> Speak Evil Of. <S%G987><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Michael <S%G3413><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Archangel, <S%G743><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> With The <S%G3588><s%> Devil <S%G1228><s%> Disputing <S%G1252><s%> He Reasoned <S%G1256><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Of Moses <S%G3475><s%> Body, <S%G4983><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Did Not Care <S%G5111><s%> A Charge <S%G2920><s%> To Bring Against Him <S%G2018><s%> Railing, <S%G988><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Rebuke <S%G2008><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> The Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

<S%G3778><s%> But These, <S%G1161><s%> Whatever Things <S%G3745><s%> <S%G3303><s%> <S%G3756><s%> They Know Not <S%G1492><s%> They Speak Evil Of; <S%G987><s%> <S%G3745><s%> But Whatever Things <S%G1161><s%> Naturally, <S%G5447><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Irrational <S%G249><s%> Animals, <S%G2226><s%> They Understand, <S%G1987><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> These Things <S%G5125><s%> They Corrupt Themselves. <S%G5351><s%>

Woe <S%G3759><s%> To Them! <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Cain <S%G2535><s%> They Went, <S%G4198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Error <S%G4106><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Balaam <S%G903><s%> For Reward <S%G3408><s%> Rushed, <S%G1632><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In The <S%G3588><s%> Gainsaying <S%G485><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Korah <S%G2879><s%> Perished. <S%G622><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G26><s%> Your Love Feasts <S%G5216><s%> Sunken Rocks, <S%G4694><s%> Feasting Together With You <S%G4910><s%> Fearlessly, <S%G870><s%> Themselves <S%G1438><s%> Pasturing; <S%G4165><s%> Clouds <S%G3507><s%> Without Water, <S%G504><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Winds <S%G417><s%> Being Carried About, <S%G4064><s%> Trees <S%G1186><s%> Autumnal, <S%G5352><s%> Without Fruit, <S%G175><s%> Twice <S%G1364><s%> Dead, <S%G599><s%> Rooted Up; <S%G1610><s%>

Waves <S%G2949><s%> Wild <S%G66><s%> Of The Sea, <S%G2281><s%> Foaming Out <S%G1890><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Their Own <S%G1438><s%> Shames; <S%G152><s%> Stars <S%G792><s%> Wandering, <S%G4107><s%> To Whom <S%G3739><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Gloom <S%G2217><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> Forever <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Has <S%G165><s%> Been Kept. <S%G5083><s%>

<S%G4395><s%> And Prophesied <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> As To Thee <S%G5125><s%> The Seventh <S%G1442><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Adam, <S%G76><s%> Enoch, <S%G1802><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Came The <S%G2064><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Amidst <S%G1722><s%> Myriads <S%G3461><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> His, <S%G846><s%>

To Execute <S%G4160><s%> Judgment <S%G2920><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Convict <S%G1827><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ungodly <S%G765><s%> Of Them <S%G846><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Works <S%G2041><s%> Ungodliness <S%G763><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Did Ungodily, <S%G764><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hard <S%G4642><s%> Things Which <S%G3739><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Sinners <S%G268><s%> Ungodly. <S%G765><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> Murmurers, <S%G1113><s%> Complainers, <S%G3202><s%> After <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1939><s%> Their Lusts <S%G846><s%> Walking; <S%G4198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4750><s%> Their Mouth <S%G846><s%> Speaks <S%G2980><s%> Great Swelling Words, <S%G5246><s%> Admiring <S%G2296><s%> Persons <S%G4383><s%> Profit <S%G5622><s%> For The Sake Of. <S%G5484><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> But Ye, <S%G1161><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> Remember <S%G3415><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Words <S%G4487><s%> Which <S%G3588><s%> Have Been Spoken Before <S%G4280><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Apostles <S%G652><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%>

That <S%G3754><s%> They Said <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> There Will Be <S%G2071><s%> Mockers, <S%G1703><s%> After <S%G2596><s%> Own <S%G3588><s%> Their <S%G1438><s%> Desires <S%G1939><s%> Walking <S%G4198><s%> Of <S%G3588><s%> Ungodlinesses. <S%G763><s%>
These <S%G3778><s%> Are <S%G1526><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Set Apart Themselves, <S%G592><s%> Natural Men, The <S%G5591><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having. <S%G2192><s%>

<S%G5210><s%> But Ye, <S%G1161><s%> Beloved, <S%G27><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G40><s%> On Your Most Holy <S%G5216><s%> Faith <S%G4102><s%> Building Up <S%G2026><s%> Yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> Praying, <S%G4336><s%>

Yourselves <S%G1438><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Keep, <S%G5083><s%> Awaiting <S%G4327><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mercy <S%G1656><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2962><s%> Of Our Lord <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> Life <S%G2222><s%> Eternal. <S%G166><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Some <S%G3303><s%> Pity, <S%G1653><s%> Making A Difference <S%G1252><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> But Others <S%G1161><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Fear <S%G5401><s%> Save, <S%G4982><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fire <S%G4442><s%> Snatching Them; <S%G726><s%> Hating <S%G3404><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> By <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh <S%G4561><s%> Spotted <S%G4695><s%> Garment. <S%G5509><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But To Him Who <S%G1161><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> To Keep <S%G5442><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Without Stumbling, <S%G679><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Set Them <S%G2476><s%> Before <S%G2714><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1391><s%> His Glory <S%G846><s%> Blameless <S%G299><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> Exultation, <S%G20><s%>

To The Only <S%G3441><s%> Wise <S%G4680><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G4990><s%> Our Saviour, <S%G2257><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Greatness, <S%G3172><s%> Might <S%G2904><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Authority, <S%G1849><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
